document.full_text: fast-food chain mcdonald's corp, trying to grab positive headlines in an economic recovery still struggling to create living-wage jobs, announced on monday that it would do all of its spring hiring in one fell swoop.
document.title: mcdonald's one-day hiring blitz seen as pr move
